0110011000111110 1100010101110000 1 -> sum: 0010101110101111, cout: 1
0101101110110110 0010101001100100 1 -> sum: 1000011000011011, cout: 0

0100100000110001 1011110111011110 0 -> sum: 0000011000001111, cout: 1
1100100101101110 0110010000101101 0 -> sum: 0010110110011011, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
